title: The William Monk Mystery Collection - Anne Perry
description:
Audio Books : Mystery and Suspense : Other quality : English

All titles are unabridged (except #8.) and all are CD like quality (except #7. which is rare and only available on cassettes). No suitable audio version of book 6 could ever be found.

Davina Porter narrates books 1, 2, 3, 5 and 19. Terence Hardiman narrates books 4 and 9 to 15, except that Geoffrey Annis narrates book 7.
Gordan Griffin narrates book 16 and Ralph Lister narrates books 17 and 18. Deirdra Whelan narrates book 20.

(I have deliberately avoided readings by David Colacci as I find his American accent unconvincing for these purely British novels).

Most are recorded at 32 kbps / 22 kHz Mono CBR MP3, except for books 4, 9, 10, 11, 18, 19 and 20 which either 48 kbps or 40 kbps Mono CBR MP3.

Many thanks to Phyl for providing better copies of books 1 to 3 and book 17. All titles that are not attributed to others are by peterg23.

There are no unabridged recordings of books 6 or 8 in existence to my knowledge.



Few authors have made Victorian London as engaging and lively as Anne Perry has and her rich descriptions and charismatic characters have long captivated fans around the world.
These compelling Victorian mystery novels feature private investigator William Monk.
* For more details on individual books please click here: http://www.anneperry.net/books

01. The Face of a Stranger (1990) OD, 13:20 - (thanks to Phyl)
02. A Dangerous Mourning (1991) OD, 14:48 - (thanks to Phyl)
03. Defend And Betray (1992) OD, 16:23 - (thanks to Phyl)
04. A Sudden, Fearful Death (1993) CD, 16:25
05. Sins of the Wolf (1994) CD, 16:04 - (thanks to Allhoney)
06. Cain His Brother (1995) missing - no suitable audio version could ever be found
07. Weighed in the Balance (1996) Cassette, 13:29 (sound quality is decent)
08. The Silent Cry (1997) ED, This is an abridged version of about 3 hours duration - it's the only version available to my knowledge.
09. A Breach of Promise (1997) CD, 14:14 (US title: Whited Sepulchers)
10. The Twisted Root (1999) OD, 13:11
11. Slaves of Obsession (2000) CD, 13:27
12. A Funeral in Blue (2001) CD, 13:16
13. Death of a Stranger (2002) CD, 12:45
14. The Shifting Tide (2004) CD, 13:02
15. Dark Assassin (2006) CD, 12:24
16. Execution Dock (2009) MP3CD, 13:35
17. Acceptable Loss (2011) ED, 12:03 - (thanks to Phyl)
18. A Sunless Sea (2012) ED, 15:23 - (thanks to Paranoid)
19. Blind Justice (2013) ED, 12:30 - (thanks to Paranoid)
20. Blood on the Water (2014) ED, 11:05 - (thanks to Antoek)



Enjoy and Seed!!
